data.eml:eml: A new species of Microschemobrycon (Characiformes: Characidae) from Rio Xingu basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ohara, Willian M., Jerep, Fernado C., Cavallaro, Marcel R. (2019): A new species of Microschemobrycon (Characiformes: Characidae) from Rio Xingu basin, Brazil. Zootaxa 4576 (2): 326-336, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4576.2.6
